name: thedailybeast
text:
Ike and “DJ TJ,” as he calls his best buddy, saw sleeping rhinoceroses “and we just blew their fucking heads off. It was beautiful,” he joked to @mollyjongfast and @therickwilson on @newabnormalpod.

How sweet.

name: thedailybeast
text:
Ike totally swears that he admires one of the president’s top 4 smartest children for more than his guns. He even appreciates Don’s nuanced political views, especially when it comes to boats. 
https://t.co/fsdeQIkLyT https://t.co/ryZnGw6yry

name: thedailybeast
text:
Ok, back to reality…

Ike also shares why he why beating Trump won’t be enough—even if he is “fucking, literally, the Penguin from Batman.” 

“The worst thing we could do is push hard to get Joe Biden elected, and then go back to sleep.”
https://t.co/fsdeQIkLyT https://t.co/Z3s7yJx0Av

name: thedailybeast
text:

text:
